item.title: collecting blood for fun and profit
item.description: Horns grows a pair of wings, and Cassandra agrees to help the party in exchange for the bag of devouring. A tortle named Krull escorts the Menagerie from Arkhan’s tower to Arkhan himself. They negotiate a trade of the orb of dragonkind for a vial of Tiamat’s blood and Val backs down from dueling Arkhan. Uldrak’s empyrean form is restored, and on the way back to the Demon Zapper the party stops at a conveniently-relocated Wandering Emporium to shelter from an acid storm.

item.title: stack.push(quest)
item.description: Red Ruth tells the party that Ralzala can be freed by drinking the blood of a titan, and conveniently also divulges the location of a titan named Uldrak. The Menagerie names their infernal warmachine “the Anti-Chrysler” and goes to pay Uldrak a visit, but they’re diverted yet again by the need to restore his titan form. They set course for Arkhan’s tower, and are attacked by vrocks along the way.

item.title: friendly fire
item.description: The Menagerie set up camp in Red Ruth’s yard to house-sit while she’s away. In the middle of resting, they’re attacked by banshees and a treant! Gimble learns a little about arcane edge cases, Not-Bailey dies for a moment, Horns becomes a fire elemental, and Finn feeds the treant to a bag.

item.title: avernian errands
item.description: The Menagerie meet Red Ruth and she tells them her price for the information about Ralzala that they want. They Tokyo-drift through the lava geysers of the fire plains and arrive at the Wandering Emporium to book Red Ruth’s spa visit. While at the Wandering Emporium, Horns has a beer and the crew do a small amount of shopping before racing back across the fire plains to house-sit for Red Ruth while she takes herself out for a spa day.

item.title: hashtag not all bags
item.description: Lulu remembers some locations that may help the party find Zariel’s ring, and the group travels to a weapon known as the Demon Zapper. They meet Ralzala, a dao who guards the Demon Zapper, and undertake a quest to find Red Ruth in the Bone Brambles for information on Ralzala’s behalf. Oneshoe almost gets eaten by a malevolent purse.
